testCase.name: TelaInicial navigates to Login on button press
TelaInicial navigates to TelaCadastro on button press
Elder Component renders correctly with given props
Elder Component calls onPress when image is pressed
Elder Component calls onEdit when edit button is pressed
TelaCadastro Component validates form inputs and shows errors
TelaCadastro Component calls createUser on successful validation and navigates to Login
Login Component shows alert if email or password is empty
Login Component shows alert if user is not found
Login Component navigates to UserProfile on successful login
Footer Component renders correctly with given props
Footer Component calls onPress when Rotinas button is pressed
Footer Component calls onPress when Registros button is pressed
Footer Component calls onPress when Portal button is pressed
Footer Component calls onPress when Perfil button is pressed
